meanings: Noun 비격식, 구식이 되어감 친구 (→pen pal)
Noun 비격식 이봐(남자를 거칠게 부를 때 쓰는 말)

vlive.korean: 팔이 길어 - 형 멋있어! Your arms are long. - You're so cool. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: Your arms are long. - You're so cool.

vlive.korean: 역시! - 와 팔 진짜 길다~ As expected. - Wow! Your arms are so long. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: As expected. - Wow! Your arms are so long.

vlive.korean: 머리나 팔로 치고... So I want to hit either with head or my arm... 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) OFFLINE #2
vlive.english: So I want to hit either with head or my arm...

vlive.korean: 팔 진짜 길어 어떻게 저렇게 길지? - 저 댓글 공간 남기는 센스! Arms are so long. How is it so long? - Sense of him leaving that space for comments. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: Arms are so long. How is it so long? - Sense of him leaving that space for comments.

vlive.korean: 팔이랑 어깨! Arms and shoulders! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 23 (생일 기념❤)🦊

examples.korean: He had been wounded in the arm. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 팔에 부상을 당했었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had been wounded in the arm. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His hand was severed from his arm. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 손이 팔에서 잘려 나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His hand was severed from his arm. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He nestled the baby in his arms. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 아기를 두 팔에 따뜻이 안았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He nestled the baby in his arms. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She cradled the child in her arms. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그 아이를 두 팔로 받쳐 안았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She cradled the child in her arms. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She twined her arms around my neck. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 두 팔로 내 목을 휘감았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She twined her arms around my neck. Add to Wordbook
